Steel Magnolia — EP is a 5-song extended play released on February 23, 2010, by country music duo Steel Magnolia. The EP features the duo's debut single, "Keep On Lovin' You", which has reached the Top 20 on the U.S. "Billboard" Hot Country Songs chart. It also features the song "Ooh La La" which they performed on "Can You Duet". Also included are two additional live cover songs, "I Need You" (originally performed by Tim McGraw and Faith Hill), and "Fast as You", originally sung by Dwight Yoakam.
